title: Goblin Slayer: Goblin's Crown
synopsis: Goblin Slayer and his party head up to the snowy mountains in the north after receiving a request from the Sword Maiden. A small village gets attacked, they encounter a mysterious chapel, and something about how these goblins are acting bothers the Goblin Slayer.
voices: ['Umehara, Yuuichirou', 'Ogura, Yui', 'Iguchi, Yuka', 'Touyama, Nao', 'Uchida, Maaya', 'Endou, Aya', 'Sugita, Tomokazu', 'Hikasa, Youko', 'Nakamura, Yuuichi', 'Matsuoka, Yoshitsugu']
staff: [['Ozaki, Takaharu', ['Director']], ['Mili', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Kagyuu, Kumo', ['Original Creator']], ['Kurata, Hideyuki', ['Screenplay']]]
